Uses of Package
morfologik.stemming

  • Classes in morfologik.stemming used by morfologik.stemming 
    Class and Description
    Dictionary
    A dictionary combines FSA automaton and metadata describing the internals of dictionary entries' coding (DictionaryMetadata.
    DictionaryAttribute
    Attributes applying to Dictionary and DictionaryMetadata.
    DictionaryMetadata
    Description of attributes, their types and default values.
    DictionaryMetadataBuilder
    Helper class to build DictionaryMetadata instances.
    EncoderType
    Sequence encoder type.
    IStemmer
    A generic "stemmer" interface in Morfologik.
    WordData
    Stem and tag data associated with a given word.
